ResumePage.summaryContent: Highly motivated and results-oriented Data Scientist and AI/ML Engineer with a proven track record of developing and deploying impactful machine learning solutions. Expertise spans the entire ML Lifecycle, from insightful data analysis and statistical inference to robust model building, deployment, and monitoring. Passionate about leveraging AI and machine learning to solve real-world problems and drive significant business value.

blulytix.description: Delivered numerous client-centric Data Science and AI/ML solutions, including specialized chatbots with LangChain (RAG) and an AI-driven interview prep tool. Leveraged AWS services (EC2, S3) for scalable deployments, automated cloud operations with Boto3, and containerized applications with Docker for 98.8% API uptime.

teamInternet.description: Deployed production-grade ML models for customer engagement, reducing feature delivery time by 25% through CI/CD optimization. Conducted quarterly risk assessments using NIST AI RMF and documented model bias detection. Collaborated with stakeholders to translate challenges into data-driven solutions.
